title: Türkiye Riviera Five-Star Beachfront All-Inclusive Resort with Daily Dining, Free-Flow Drinks & Onsite Waterpark
description: A Luxury Escapes first - a Türkiye five-star beachfront all-inclusive oasis for everyone. Nestled on the shores of the Mediterranean Sea and home to several indoor and outdoor pools, an exclusive waterpark, and an array of buffet and a la carte restaurants to choose from, this luxurious resort has everything you’ll want and need while escaping the everyday. Lounge by one of the shimmering pools, soak up the sunshine as a family at the beach playground, make use of the open-air fitness centre, and rejuvenate at the high-end Thalasso & Medikal Spa. End your day with a refreshing drink at one of the resort's stylish bars, offering panoramic views of the stunning surroundings, from the lush gardens to the coast, and savour the flavours of Türkiye.
offer_address: Belek, İleribaşı Mevkii. 5. Parsel, 07506 Antalya, Türkiye

title: Turkish Riviera Clifftop Escape with Onsite Water Park, All-Inclusive Dining & Free-Flow Drinks
description: Experience the magic of the Turkish Riviera with a stay at this breathtaking property in Alanya. Overlooking the azure Mediterranean Sea, this resort offers stunning views from every corner. Enjoy a refreshing dip in the infinity pool or splash around at the onsite Utopia World Aquapark, after exploring vibrant local markets and the historic Alanya Castle nearby. Savour authentic Turkish cuisine at the onsite restaurants, or sip a cocktail at the rooftop bar while watching the sunset, the choice is yours. For the adventurous, Alanya's famed Dim Cave and Sapadere Canyon are within easy reach. Explore Turkiye like never before with a stay at this Mediterranean wonder.
offer_address: Beldesi Karagedik Mevkii, Merkez Sk., 07430 Alanya/Antalya, Türkiye

title: Five-Star Turkey Kempinski Oceanfront Glamour on the Med with Two Championship 18-Hole Golf Courses
description: Signature five-star luxury is just the start at the opulent Kempinski Hotel The Dome Belek, a shining gem along Turkey's Mediterranean coastline. Sitting on the shores of Kadriye Beach in Antalya, this architectural delight is a feast for the senses with a vast 2,123sqm outdoor swimming pool and eight restaurants and bars. Savour freshly prepared pastries at the Kempinski Patisserie, start your day with a breakfast fit for royalty at Lale Restaurant and indulge in the finest regional Italian dishes at Cilantro Restaurant. Keen golfers will delight in the two world-class 18-hole courses - The PGA Sultan and The Pasha, designed by leading architects of European Golf Design.
offer_address: Kadriye Mahallesi, Kadriye 3 Sokak, No: 8/7A 07500, Belek, Turkey
